title: Guns And Rental Cars, Worst Trailer We've Ever Seen? 05.31.22
itunes:title: Guns And Rental Cars, Worst Trailer We've Ever Seen? 05.31.22
description:
In episode 1258, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Guy Montgomery to discuss how… We Know The Answers, We Just Can’t Use Them Unless They Make Rich People Richer, Herschel Walker Gets Money From the Makers of the AR Used in Uvalde, That NFT Show Idea Couldn’t Look More Like a Total Sh-t Show and more!

  1. We Know The Answers, We Just Can’t Use Them Unless They Make Rich People Richer
  2. Australia confiscated 650,000 guns. Murders and suicides plummeted.
  3. Herschel Walker Gets Money From the Makers of the AR Used in Uvalde
  4. Clip: Herschel Walker's Attempt at Gun Control?
  5. That NFT Show Idea Couldn’t Look More Like a Total Sh-t Show

LISTEN: Cumbia De La Juventud by Los Golden Boys

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
